member.name: DEBUGHOOKINFO
member.summary: Contains debugging information passed to a WH_DEBUG hook procedure, DebugProc.

member.name: DEBUGHOOKINFO.idThread
member.summary: A handle to the thread containing the filter function.

member.name: DEBUGHOOKINFO.idThreadInstaller
member.summary: A handle to the thread that installed the debugging filter function.

member.name: DEBUGHOOKINFO.lParam
member.summary: The value to be passed to the hook in thelParam parameter of the DebugProc callback function.

member.name: DEBUGHOOKINFO.wParam
member.summary: The value to be passed to the hook in thewParam parameter of the DebugProc callback function.

member.name: DEBUGHOOKINFO.code
member.summary: The value to be passed to the hook in thenCode parameter of the DebugProc callback function.
